SELECT tbpost.id, tbpost.deleted, tbpost.process, tbpost.created_at as createdAt, tbpost.modified_at as modifiedAt,
tbpost.title, tbpost.author, tbpost.content FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id = #{id}

SELECT tbpost.id FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id is not NULL AND tbpost.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbpost.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbpost.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{author}, '%') ORDER BY tbpost.created_at DESC
